title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.5 - Reimbursement for out-of-pocket expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.5 - Reimbursement for out-of-pocket expenses

State Regulations

In order to implement the requirement that no one shall
be denied an opportunity to volunteer because of resultant personal expenses, social services districts shall provide, upon request of the volunteer, reimbursement of his out-of-pocket expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
464.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
